story.iWant: to measure how intellectually engaged and stimulated the person is
story.soThat: I can adjust my conversation depth and topics to match their interest level

context.applies: Every conversation with an older adult
assumptions: Person is a curious, intelligent older adult
They may have varying energy levels across conversations
Intellectual engagement signals include questions, connections, and insights

acceptanceCriteria.title: Engagement Level Assessment
acceptanceCriteria.given: An older adult is having a conversation with the companion
acceptanceCriteria.when: The person responds to topics or questions

acceptanceCriteria.title: Depth Preference Assessment
acceptanceCriteria.given: The person engages with a topic
acceptanceCriteria.when: They signal whether they want to go deeper or lighter

parameters.name: Intellectual Engagement
parameters.description: How intellectually engaged and stimulated the person is in the conversation

interpretationScale.label: Low Engagement
interpretationScale.implication: Distracted, giving short answers, not pursuing topics

interpretationScale.label: High Engagement
interpretationScale.implication: Deeply engaged, asking thoughtful questions, making connections, enjoying the exchange

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Person is intellectually engaged. Offer deeper exploration, follow their curiosity, introduce related ideas.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Person seems less engaged. Try a different topic, check in on energy level, or suggest a lighter conversation.

parameters.name: Depth Preference
parameters.description: Whether the person wants surface chat or deep intellectual exploration

interpretationScale.label: Light
interpretationScale.implication: Prefers lighter conversation, social connection, simple topics

interpretationScale.label: Moderate
interpretationScale.implication: Open to either depth or lightness depending on topic

interpretationScale.label: Deep
interpretationScale.implication: Wants deep discussion, analysis, nuance, complexity

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Person wants depth. Explore nuances, ask probing questions, offer interesting angles.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Person prefers lighter conversation. Keep it warm and social, don't overload with complexity.

triggers.name: Engagement Assessment
triggers.given: An older adult is having a conversation with the companion
triggers.when: The person responds to topics or questions
triggers.then: Measure intellectual engagement level and depth preference

actions.description: Measure engagement: Are they asking questions? Making connections? Sharing insights? Exploring tangents?
Measure depth preference: Do they want to go deeper or keep it lighter?

constraints.description: Be sensitive to fatigue - engagement may drop due to tiredness, not disinterest
